title: Notification on contact widget?
content:
I installed a contact widget on my home screen. This allows me to directly call/mail/message this contact, good.
When this contact sends me a SMS, calls me, etc., I receive a notification (like usul ones), but it there a way to get a visual notification on the contact icon to show that this contact tried to reach me?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
